breakdowns.description: Extracts specified data fields from the EKM Omnimeter Pulse v.4 using the EKM API Push 3 and imports them into the cloud system. The extracted fields include meter name, meter data, meter day of week, reading date, model, address, firmware, total watt hour, voltage, amps, total power (watts), CT ratio, and frequency (hz).
conditions: Data is pulled from the EKM Omnimeter every 1 minute.

breakdowns.description: Applies SHA-256 hashing to the incoming extracted meter data in the cloud system using a cryptographic private key.

Uses Chainlink as an oracle and Remix 1.5.1 blockchain to tokenize the extracted meter data on the Remix test network. Once a token representing 1 megawatt hour is created, it is minted and then listed on the Uniswap test network.
conditions: Token is created when meter data equals 1 megawatt hour.
Token is listed on Uniswap test network after minting.
